spiritsExplanation:
The workout, titled 'Express Bootcamp HIIT Row,' suggests a high-intensity interval training (HIIT) format with a focus on maximizing exertion in a short time. The metadata further supports this with a 'Workout intensity level' of 3 out of 3 and '90-second intervals' which are characteristic of intense, heart-pumping workouts. The playlist includes energetic tracks such as 'Get Out My Head' and 'Fortress,' enhancing the high-energy vibe. Thus, 'High-Energy & Intense' is assigned a strong score of 0.9.

The location described as 'along Indian Creek' and the visual indication of rowing on a waterway point to an outdoor setting. This justifies the 'Outdoor & Adventure' spirit, scoring at 0.8 due to the explicit mention of the natural environment engaging in rowing activity. 

No evidence suggests a focus on rhythm, structure, or sports-specific skills beyond standard rowing, so those spirits are not applicable.
